title: Happier Than Ever (with the Count)
lyrics:
[Chorus: Billie Eilish, 
The Count
]
When I'm counting with you
I'm happier than ever
Numbers sound so much better
Here is what we'll do
[Verse: Billie Eilish, 
The Count
, 
Elmo
]
Come on, let's count to 2
One, two of Bert's sweaters
One, two heads all together
Come on, let's count to 2
Oh, wonderful
One two, tip taps of your shoe
One, two apples
This one's for you
[Chorus: Billie Eilish & The Count, 
The Count
]
When I'm counting with you
I'm happier than ever
Numbers sound so much better
Now, let's count me and you
One, two
